column2: ALASKA DMV TEST
Question Text
1. __________ are blue with white letters and symbols.
2. Highway hypnosis is a driving condition that can result from:
column6: staring at the roadway for long periods of time.

column2: 3. If you are about to miss your exit when driving on a freeway, you should:
column4: use the right turn signal, check your mirrors and move to the right.
column6: pull over to the right and back up with caution until you reach the exit ramp.
column10: continue on to the next exit.

column2: 4. Signs containing information about hazardous conditions are known as _____ signs.
5. On a road with two or more lanes in the same direction, you approach an emergency vehicle that is stopped with its warning lights on. You must:
column4: slow down. If possible, change lanes.
column6: pass the emergency vehicle as quickly as possible.
column8: drive to the right side of the road and stop.
column10: maintain your current speed and stay in your lane.

column2: 6. A driver should be extra alert for motorcyclists, bicycles and pedestrians. Why?
column8: They are hard to see in traffic.

column2: 7. Parking is not allowed:
column4: within 250 feet of a traffic light.
column8: within 300 feet of a pedestrian safety area.
column10: in an intersection, unless permitted by signs.

column2: 8. When turning around on a city street, drivers should:
column8: never make a U-turn because it is illegal.
column10: back up to where they should have been.

column2: 9. Yellow traffic signs:
column6: when combined with an octagonal shape, tell drivers they must come to a complete stop at the marked stop line.

column2: 10. To reduce the risk of being involved in a crash, drivers should:
column4: ignore other drivers on the road.
column6: communicate with other drivers on the road.
column8: drive on side streets and back roads whenever possible.

column2: 11. This road sign means:
12. This sign tells drivers:
column4: they may not turn right or left during the red light.
column6: turning right on red is forbidden.
column8: they must wait for the traffic signal to turn green before turning right or left.

column2: 13. A solid double yellow center line means:
column6: passing is not permitted in either directions.

column2: 14. If your car goes into water, you should:
column4: remove yourself before it starts to sink.
column8: wait for water to rush in and let it out in small breaths through your nose.

column2: 15. Slower moving vehicles on a multi-lane highway should travel in:
16. A red traffic sign means?
17. This road sign means:
column6: You may proceed only if the way is clear
column8: You are about to enter a one-way street the wrong way

column2: 18. Green and white signs:
column6: warn drivers of unexpected road conditions.
column8: give information about directions and distances.
column10: are mainly used at intersections and driveways.

column2: 19. What is the first thing you should do if your wheels move off the pavement?
column4: Ease your foot off the gas pedal and brake gently.
column6: Try pumping the gas pedal to increase pressure.
column8: Pull over to the right and sound your horn to warn the other drivers.

column2: 20. This road sign means:
